Class KinesisDataProcessorBatch<TBody>

Namespace
Innovt.Cloud.AWS.Lambda.Kinesis
Assembly
Innovt.Cloud.AWS.Lambda.Kinesis.dll

Represents a base class for processing Kinesis data streams in batch, where each batch consists of messages of type TBody.

public abstract class KinesisDataProcessorBatch<TBody> : KinesisProcessorBase<TBody> where TBody : class, IDataStream

Type Parameters

TBody

The type of messages in the data stream.
